item.title: Fly tipping on the corner of Doon Street, 16th June
item.description:
Someone has flighted white goods, possibly a freezer or fridge on the corner of a very narrow pavement. Potentially dangerous for children if they were to start playing with it because itâ€™s very rusty or they could get themselves locked in and suffocate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 115, Stamford Street, Waterloo, London

item.title: Cares passing through LTN gate, 16th June
item.description:
Over the past few weeks, I have seen a number of cars passing through the LTN gate. I fear people are using this as a cut through. It is dangerous and the enforcement cameras should be repositioned to pick it up.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Nevill Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 abandoned bikes, 16th June
item.description:
Line bikes abandoned directly inside the gate of the Peabody estate so that people actually coming into their homes cannot get past the gate to get home disgusting. This behaviour illustrates exactly why line bikes need to be banned.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Miller Walk, Waterloo, London

item.title: ASAP pls, 16th June
item.description:
Please collect ASAP as the local vagrants keep on redistributing it and spreading it out across the street. Also, we know you know that bicycle that you said you'd remove in JANUARY is still here in the street. Please remove that too please.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mare Street, Hackney, London

item.description:
